summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2022, for the improvement of Earl Avenue Northwest from West Sixty-seventh Street to West Seventieth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing watermains thereon of proper dimensions and materials, together with all gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenance for the proper water service and protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 20427, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
